metadata.dc:author: Sebastián Borruel, J L
Navarro Pardo, C
Ruiz Ramo, M
Castillo Jimeno, J M
Santiago González, A
metadata.dc:description: Herein we describe a case of vesical bilharziasis in a Spanish patient who became infected during a trip to an endemic area. The characteristic features of the disease and particularly its relationship to squamous type bladder tumors are discussed with a special focus on treatment with Praziquantel.
metadata.dc:title: Bilharziosis vesical: a propósito de un caso.
[Bladder bilharziasis: report of a case].
